value:
$WmMPID_アネット,ch17_18_Annette_F_Normal,Face|My dearest wish is for my family
to reunite.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Umm... Can I speak with
you, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Of course. What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What you said before. Everything
about $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes! So you remember now too?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh. No... I'm sorry, Alfonse. I can't
say I believe the summoner of legend
is anywhere around here.$k$pI talked to Commander Anna, and
everyone else I could find, and no
one even recognized the name...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...I see.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But even saying that, and believing
what I'm saying is true...$k$pIt makes me sad, somehow. Like
I'm...lonelier, in a way.$k$pJust hearing the name now, I can
hardly hold back the tears...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Sharena...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|And I don't remember one thing
about $Nu...$k$pHow can that be, Alfonse?
Have I... Have we forgotten
something important?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It's all right, Sharena. Not to worry.
I am working out a plan. I'll just
need your trust.$k$p$Sbs150|
